mapper.select: select a.file_id as id, a.name, a.dir_type, a.size, a.md5 , FROM_UNIXTIME(a.fn_ctime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as ctime , FROM_UNIXTIME(a.fn_atime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as atime , FROM_UNIXTIME(a.fn_mtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as mtime from file_info a, partition_info b where a.parent_id = #{id} and b.evd_id = #{evd_id} and (a.dir_type = 3 or a.dir_type = 5) and a.par_id = b.par_id order by a.dir_type, a.name
